title: It's coming:
body: Man I got sick of using the same old boring websites to look up my birth chart, and since I'm an astroDev I decided to make my own . It's still in development, but I'm really excited about it. I'm learning a lot of new things. I hope I can finish it soon, so I can share it with you guys. I'm sure you'll love it!

title: Goodbye Learning Camp
body: I had a great time at the learning camp. Thanks to Rootstrap, the company that organized it, I learned a lot of new things and met a lot of new people. It was a great introduction to React and the ones who mentored us were really good, they were always there to help us and answer our questions. I hope I can attend another one of these camps in the future, because they are really helpful, I did this website using all the knowledge I got from the camp and I'm really proud of it. I hope you like it too!
